subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Since 2003, the Pistons have won 12 of 13 games when they have had a chance to clinch a series. They lead Chicago 3-0 in the best-of-seven series.
snippet: Since 2003, the Pistons have won 12 of 13 games when they have had a chance to clinch a series. They lead Chicago 3-0 in the best-of-seven series.
